span.span: Returns a value indicating that for all instances that adhere to the query, only their class definitions are to be returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性的值将覆盖以前存储在对象中的任何值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的标志。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new flag. ## 属性值Property Value `true` 如果查询请求的结果集; 只能使用类定义，否则为`false`。`true` if the query requests only class definitions of the result set; otherwise, `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
